casebody.data:
Robert SIPKO, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
KOGER, INC., Koger Distributed Solutions, Inc., Koger Professional Services, Inc., Koger Limited (Dublin), and George Sipko, Defendants-Respondents,
and
Rastislav Sipko, Defendant. M-951/953 September Term 2018
082090 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 6, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion to dismiss the notice of petition for certification (M-951) is denied; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for an extension of time within which to file a respondent's brief in opposition to the petition for certification (M-953) is granted, the Court noting that the response was considered an answer in opposition to leave to appeal. (See Order M-950/952/989-18).
